title.v: cập nhật kết quả phỏng vấn

items.key: (ma_vong in (select a.ma_vong from hrrmhtttct a join hrrmdotct b on a.ma_ht = b.ma_ht join hrrmhs c on b.ma_vtr = c.ma_vtr and b.ma_bp = c.ma_bp where b.ma_dot = c.ma_dot and ma_hs = '{$%c[ma_hs]}' group by a.ma_vong) or '{$%c[ma_ht]}' = '') and status = '1'
items.check: ma_vong in (select a.ma_vong from hrrmhtttct a join hrrmdotct b on a.ma_ht = b.ma_ht join hrrmhs c on b.ma_vtr = c.ma_vtr and b.ma_bp = c.ma_bp where b.ma_dot = c.ma_dot and ma_hs = '{$%c[ma_hs]}' group by a.ma_vong) or '{$%c[ma_ht]}' = ''

command.text: declare @resultName nvarchar(128) select @resultName = case when @@language = 'V' then ten_kq else ten_kq2 end from hrdmkq where ma_kq = 1 select 'this._resultName = ''' + replace(replace(isnull(@resultName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';initForm(this);' as message return

declare @ho_va_ten nvarchar(128), @ten_vong nvarchar(128), @ma_dot varchar(32), @ma_hs varchar(32), @ma_vong varchar(32), @ngay_pv smalldatetime, @ma_ht varchar(32), @cookie varchar(32) select @ma_dot = rtrim(ma_dot), @ma_hs = rtrim(ma_hs), @ma_vong = rtrim(ma_vong), @ngay_pv = ngay_pv, @cookie = convert(varchar(19), datetime2, 121) from @@table where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @ho_va_ten = rtrim(ho_uv) + space(1) + ten_uv from hrrmhs where ma_hs = @ma_hs select @ten_vong = ten_vong%l from hrdmvongtd where ma_vong = @ma_vong select top 1 @ma_ht = a.ma_ht from hrrmhttt a join hrrmdotct b on a.ma_ht = b.ma_ht join hrrmhs c on b.ma_vtr = c.ma_vtr and b.ma_bp = c.ma_bp where b.ma_dot = c.ma_dot and ma_hs = @ma_hs select @ho_va_ten as ho_va_ten, @ten_vong as ten_vong%l, @ma_ht as ma_ht, @ma_dot as ma_dot_old, @ma_hs as ma_hs_old, @ma_vong as ma_vong_old, @ngay_pv as ngay_pv_old, @cookie as cookie return

declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @$recordHasBeenChanged nvarchar(512) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đợt tuyển dụng %s1, mã ứng viên %s2, mã vòng thi %s3 và ngày phỏng vấn %s4 đã có hoặc lồng nhau trong cập nhật kết quả phỏng vấn.' else N'The record consisting of period code %s1, candidate id %s2, recruitment round %s3 and date %s4 is invalid or already exists.' end select @$recordHasBeenChanged = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đợt tuyển dụng %s1, mã ứng viên %s2, mã vòng thi %s3 và ngày phỏng vấn %s4 đã được sửa hoặc xóa bởi người sử dụng khác.' else N'The record consisting of period code %s1, candidate id %s2, recruitment round %s3 and date %s4 has been modified or deleted by another user.' end

if exists(select * from @@table where ma_dot = @ma_dot and ma_hs = @ma_hs and ma_vong = @ma_vong and ngay_pv = @ngay_pv) begin select 'ma_hs' as field, replace(replace(replace(replace(@$exists, '%s1', rtrim(@ma_dot)), '%s2', rtrim(@ma_hs)), '%s3', rtrim(@ma_vong)), '%s4', rtrim(convert(char(10), @ngay_pv, 103))) as message return end declare @wsID varchar(8) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where upper(name) = 'M_WS_ID' select @stt_rec = max(stt_rec) from @@table select @stt_rec = @wsID + case when @stt_rec is null then '000000001' else replace(str(cast(substring(@stt_rec, 2, 9) as bigint) + 1, 9), ' ', '0') end + 'HPV' select @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID
update @d01 set stt_rec = @stt_rec

update hrrmkqpv set ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs from hrrmkqpv a left join hrrmdot b on a.ma_dot = b.ma_dot where b.ma_dot = @ma_dot and a.stt_rec = @stt_rec insert into hrrmkqpvct select * from @d01 select @stt_rec as stt_rec
&AfterVoucherUpdate;

if not exists(select * from @@table where ma_dot = @$ma_dot_old and ma_hs = @$ma_hs_old and ma_vong = @$ma_vong_old and ngay_pv = @$ngay_pv_old) begin select 'ma_hs' as field, replace(replace(replace(replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s1', rtrim(@$ma_dot_old)), '%s2', rtrim(@$ma_hs_old)), '%s3', rtrim(@$ma_vong_old)), '%s4', rtrim(convert(char(10), @$ngay_pv_old, 103))) as message return end
if @ma_dot <> @$ma_dot_old or @ma_hs <> @$ma_hs_old or @ma_vong <> @$ma_vong_old or @ngay_pv <> @$ngay_pv_old begin if exists(select * from @@table where (not (ma_dot = @$ma_dot_old and ma_hs = @$ma_hs_old and ma_vong = @$ma_vong_old and ngay_pv = @$ngay_pv_old)) and (ma_dot = @ma_dot and ma_hs = @ma_hs and ma_vong = @ma_vong and ngay_pv = @ngay_pv)) begin select 'ma_hs' as field, replace(replace(replace(replace(@$exists, '%s1', rtrim(@ma_dot)), '%s2', rtrim(@ma_hs)), '%s3', rtrim(@ma_vong)), '%s4', rtrim(convert(char(10), @ngay_pv, 103))) as message return end end
if $d01.NewValue <> $d01.OldValue begin update @d01 set stt_rec = @stt_rec delete hrrmkqpvct where stt_rec = @stt_rec end

if $d01.NewValue <> $d01.OldValue insert into hrrmkqpvct select * from @d01 update @@table set ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs from @@table a left join hrrmdot b on a.ma_dot = b.ma_dot where b.ma_dot = @ma_dot and a.stt_rec = @stt_rec update @@table set datetime2 = getdate(), user_id2 = @@userID where stt_rec = @stt_rec
&AfterVoucherUpdate;

&CommandWhenVoucherBeforeDelete;
declare @ma_hs varchar(33) select @ma_hs = ma_hs from hrrmkqpv where stt_rec = @stt_rec delete hrrmkqpvct where stt_rec = @stt_rec

action.text: if exists(select 1 from hrrmhtttct where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong) begin select noi_dung as c1, tt_dat as c2, tt_k_dat as c3, b.ten_tt%l as c4, c.ten_tt%l as c5 from hrrmhtttct a left join hrdmtths b on a.tt_dat = b.ma_tt left join hrdmtths c on a.tt_k_dat = c.ma_tt where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong return end

declare @ma_ht varchar(32) if exists(select 1 from hrrmhs where ma_hs = @ma_hs) begin select @ma_ht = a.ma_ht from hrrmhtttct a join hrrmdotct b on a.ma_ht = b.ma_ht join hrrmhs c on b.ma_vtr = c.ma_vtr and b.ma_bp = c.ma_bp where b.ma_dot = c.ma_dot and c.ma_hs = @ma_hs group by a.ma_ht if exists(select 1 from hrrmhtttct where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong) begin select isnull(@ma_ht, '') as c1, noi_dung, tt_dat, tt_k_dat, b.ten_tt%l as c4, c.ten_tt%l as c5 from hrrmhtttct a left join hrdmtths b on a.tt_dat = b.ma_tt left join hrdmtths c on a.tt_k_dat = c.ma_tt where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong return end if @ma_ht is not null begin select @ma_ht as c1, '' as c2, '' as c3, '' as c4, '' as c5, '' as c6 return end end
if @ma_ht is null begin select '' as c1, '' as c2, '' as c3, '' as c4, '' as c5, '' as c6 return end

if exists(select 1 from hrdmkq where ma_kq = @ma_kq) begin if exists(select 1 from hrrmhtttct where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong) begin declare @status varchar(32) select @status = case when @ma_kq = '1' then tt_dat when @ma_kq = '2' then tt_k_dat else '' end from hrrmhtttct where ma_ht = @ma_ht and ma_vong = @ma_vong if exists (select 1 from hrdmtths where ma_tt = @status) select ma_tt, ten_tt%l from hrdmtths where ma_tt = @status return end end
